questions.question: Solve the following trigonometric equation for 'x': sin^2(x) + 2sin(x)cos(x) - 1 = 0.
options: D) x = π/2 or x = π

questions.question: You're managing a team of engineers. Each engineer is skilled in either coding, hardware, or data analysis. If Jane can code and analyze data, and Mark can only code, who can analyze data?
options: D) Not enough information to determine

questions.question: Which famous scientist is credited with the theory of general relativity?
Which word is the synonym (similar meaning) of 'ubiquitous'?
What is the volume of a cylinder with a radius of 5 units and a height of 10 units?
You have a 3-liter jug and a 5-liter jug. How can you measure exactly 4 liters of water using only these two jugs?
options: A) Fill the 3-liter jug and pour it into the 5-liter jug. Fill the 3-liter jug again and carefully pour it into the 5-liter jug until it's full. You'll have 4 liters in the 5-liter jug.
B) Fill the 5-liter jug and pour it into the 3-liter jug until the 3-liter jug is full. You'll have 2 liters left in the 5-liter jug. Repeat this step once more to get 4 liters in the 3-liter jug.

questions.question: Which subatomic particle is found in the nucleus of an atom and has a positive charge?
In a game of chess, if a knight moves two squares in one direction and then one square perpendicular to that direction, how many different squares can it land on in one move?
What is the value of the mathematical constant 'e' (Euler's number) to three decimal places?
Who is the author of the science fiction novel 'Dune'?
